name: Farmin' Martian
description:
*download for better performance*

Welcome to Farmin' Martian! Build your alien garden by day and defend it from space bugs by night.

Features 

  • Farming and strategic base building
  • A cute and vibrant art style
  • A bopping soundtrack

Made by Thomas Keys. Special Thanks to Soren Fonnesbeck for coming up with the silly plant names.

Music Credits:

  • Just Chatting - CapatinBoomcake https://captainboomcake.newgrounds.com/
  • GOD'S TEST - DJ-AfterBurnz -https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1110207
